clab:head.clab:title: Public Records | D&B For Your Customers

clab:content.p: Help your customers with due diligence and research. The comprehensive D&B Public Records Database includes suits, liens, judgments, bankruptcies, UCCs, and more.

clab:body.p: Your customers need to use public information to help them make better business decisions. Perhaps they are conducting due diligence or research, and they look to you as a source of valuable information about legal matters involving the businesses in which they are interested.
clab:body.h2: How D&B For Your Customers helps you
clab:body.p: Among the largest of its kind, the D&B Public Records Database is the perfect solution for companies offering due diligence and research solutions. Our solutions can help your customers to determine the status of a debtor company's assets, identify legal documents that impact credit files, spot patterns of litigation, identify business-related bankruptcy involvement, and more.
clab:body.h3: The extraordinary depth, breadth, and quality of our data sets us apart.

ul.li:
The D&B public records information database offers U.S. data that includes:
149 million public records from 3,100 U.S. courts and state offices
60 million business registrations
24 million suits, liens, and judgment filings
64 million UCC filings
1.1 million bankruptcy filings

clab:body.h3: Our database building and management capabilities are one-of-a-kind.

ul.li: We are the only data provider that collects business-related suit information.
96% of bankruptcies are added with 24 hours.
Public records from multiple jurisdictions are standardized and delivered in one easy-to-process format.
Our patented Entity Matching technology and unique expertise enable you and your customers to effectively match and link similar data and maintain its quality over time.
Our globally recognized D-U-N-S® Number acts as a key for data, provides continuity and consistency, and eliminates records duplication.

clab:body.h3: Our uniquely qualified consultative team has your back.

ul.li: Specialized D&B Relationship Managers have the expertise, insight, and flexibility to help you successfully integrate D&B data and solutions into your offerings.
Our Public Records Specialists bring a dedicated focus on interpreting and helping your customers act on insight gained from public records.
Our one-touch dedicated “For Your Customers” customer hotline is at your service.
